headline: Bank of America Slightly Lowers its Price Target on Newmont Corporation (NEM) to $134 While Maintaining a Buy Rating
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is included among the 11 Best Mining Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 9, 2026, Bank of America slightly lowered its price target on Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) to $134 from $135 while maintaining a Buy rating. The firm said that the adjustment followed the updates to its model reflecting Newmont […]

headline: Bank of America CEO drops surprising view on the economy
summary: Bank of America (BAC) CEO Brian Moynihan isn’t buying into the "economic doom" narrative. In fact, in a CNBC interview, he offered a surprisingly upbeat take on the U.S. economy, citing the bank’s real-time data on January activity, which is up nearly 5% year over year. He feels those numbers ...

headline: Jobs Revisions Today: What to Know
summary: The Bureau of Labor Statistics is set to issue a final revision of jobs data for the 12 months ended March 2025.   The data will be released at 8:30 a.m. ET alongside the January jobs report.   An earlier estimate in September suggested the economy added 911,000 fewer jobs in that one year than previously thought.

headline: AI Anxiety Rattles Wall Street's Old Guard
summary: While the Dow Jones managed to notch another record high, the broader market felt the chill of "AI creep" as investors began dumping financial stocks over fears of automation. Coupled with a massive $8.2 billion loss at Ford and lukewarm retail data, the day served as a stark reminder that the AI revolution is now coming for the service sector's bottom line.

headline: Bank Of America Highlights Women Advisors And Refines Italian Leadership Narrative
summary: Forbes recently recognized hundreds of Merrill Wealth Management and Private Wealth Advisors at Bank of America on its Top Women Wealth Advisors lists, highlighting female advisory talent across the U.S. Bank of America has also appointed a new country head for Italy, reshaping leadership for its operations in that market. For investors watching NYSE:BAC, this mix of recognition and leadership change adds fresh context around the bank’s franchise and reach. The shares recently closed at...
